name: ICE-OLATED
description:
2018 Screen It Senior (15 - 18 yo) Videogame Winner

You are placed in an icy landscape, cold and desolate. You must leave to population. Your escape, by boat along a frosty river. To leave you must follow clues around the area and successfully leave.

Created by Darcy D, Canterbury, VIC

Check out the Australian Centre for the Moving Image's Screen It competition  here.
